sentences.en: A Navy medic was wounded by sniper fire.
sentences.cn: 一名海军卫生员被狙击手射伤了。

sentences.en: A sniper who doesn't relocate isn't normal.
sentences.cn: 狙击手不改变自己的位置是很不正常的.

sentences.en: A sniper's bullet tore a wall two inches above his head.
sentences.cn: 一颗狙击手的子弹打烂了他头顶上方两“英寸”地方的墙头.

sentences.en: A sniper's bullet tore up a wall two inches above his head.
sentences.cn: 一颗狙击手的子弹打烂了他头顶上方两英寸地方的墙头.

sentences.en: Do you really think the diaper sniper got all of it?
sentences.cn: 你真的认为那恋童癖拿到了所有的钱?

sentences.en: He's director of their sniper school in Zossen.
sentences.cn: 他是佐森的德国狙击手学校的教官.

sentences.en: Her aim was to become a sniper in the army.
sentences.cn: 她的目标是成为部队中的狙击手.

sentences.en: I believe a sniper in that roof have the house of hole!
sentences.cn: 我相信狙击手就在那座屋顶有窟窿的房子里!

sentences.en: If you want to be a sniper you should choose Anti - Tank Class.
sentences.cn: 如果你想当狙击手,你应该选 反 战车兵!

sentences.en: Our sniper teams observed them manning an anti-aircraft gun.
sentences.cn: 我们的狙击队观看他们操作高射炮。

sentences.en: Snake : Eva , I found that sniper you were talking about.
sentences.cn: 我发现你所说的狙击手了.

sentences.en: Sniper Team - This will create an anti - infantry Sniper Rifle on your MARV.
sentences.cn: 狙击手 —— 这将在MARV上架设一挺 反 步兵狙击步枪.

sentences.en: The next class pack will focus on the Sniper.
sentences.cn: 下一堂课包将侧重于狙击手.

sentences.en: The sniper snapped off six rapid shots.
sentences.cn: 狙击手迅速地连放了六枪.

sentences.en: What monstrous perversion of the human spirit leads a sniper to open fire on a bus carrying children?
sentences.cn: 是何等可怕的心理扭曲会导致狙击手向载满儿童的公共汽车开火？

words.tran_cn: 狙击；[鸟] 鹬；香烟屁股；被开玩笑的人物
狙击；[军] 伏击；抨击；猎鸟；诽谤

trans.tran_en: someone who shoots at people from a hidden position
